xt:extension.xt:author: Christian Lück
xt:extension.xt:name: XTriples

div.p: This framework helps editing XTriples configuration files and provides helpers for extracting XTriples from local XML documents and for running XTriples on a web services.
Components for running an XTriples Microservice
